Text:
Seeds hay, muchas, pero tienen low upload rate, no me puedo 
quejar, pero solo digo.

Sobre el game, no se nada, nunca lo jugue, solo me lo descargo 
por simple fana de Sonic.

POR FAVOR, hagan como yo, y DEJEN SUBIENDO HASTA POR 
LO MENOS 1.0 DE RATIO.

=======================================

There do are seeds, many, but at low upload rate, can't complain, 
but just saying.

About the game, can't say a thing, never played, I'm just downloading 
it because of my fanaticism with Sonic.

PLEASE, do as me, and KEEP SEEDING AT LEAST 1.0 RATIO.
